question: Will an American win the men’s race at Ultra-Trail du Mont Blanc?
description: This is a market on whether an American will win the men’s Ultra-Trail du Mont Blanc  scheduled to begin on August 27, 2021, at 11:00 AM ET. Note, this market only concerns the results of the ~106.5 mile / 171.5 km “UTMB” race and not any of the other races associated with this event (CCC, OCC, TDS, etc.). This market will resolve according to official results from UTMB organizers. The winner of UTMB will be the competitor in the “SEH” category (men’s race) with the “Class” of 1. Their nationality will be determined by the “Nationality” label for that runner. If the website is unavailable at resolution or if results are not posted at that time, additional resolution sources including official streaming footage and news sources will be used to determine the outcome. This market will resolve to “Yes” if an American man wins the UTMB race, and “No” otherwise. If the race is, for any reason, postponed, the same market resolution conditions will apply whenever the race is rescheduled. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Black Widow be the highest grossing domestic film of 2021?
description: This is a market on whether Black Widow will be the highest grossing domestic (U.S.) film of 2021. The resolution source for this market is https://www.boxofficemojo.com/year/2021/?ref_=bo_yl_table_1. To resolve the market, the source will be checked on December 31, 2021 at 11:59:59 PM ET. Should the resolution source not be available for any reason on the resolution date, the source will be checked every day at 11:59:59 PM ET until January 8, 2022, after which, if the market is still unresolvable, another credible source will be chosen by the MIC. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will the New York Yankees win the 2021 AL East?
description:
This is a market on whether the New York Yankees will win the American League East Major League Baseball (MLB) division. 

In the event of a tie after all regular season games have been played, the market will resolve according to Major League Baseball’s playoff tiebreaker rules. In the event a division winner is not determined by November 1, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50. 

Results of this market will be decided by official standings available on https://www.mlb.com/standings.

In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: dodgers
description: This is a market on whether the Los Angeles Dodgers will be declared champions of the NL West division for the 2021 MLB regular season. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Los Angeles Dodgers are declared as having clinched their division by the resolution source (https://www.mlb.com/standings). If the division is clinched by any other team, this market will resolve to “No”. This market will resolve whenever the NL West division becomes clinched by any team. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will EIP-3756 "Gas Limit Cap" be accepted prior to January 1, 2022?
description:
This is a market on the acceptance of EIP-3756. This market will resolve “Yes” if at any point at or before December 31, 2021, 11:59:59 PM ET, the status of EIP-3756 is changed to Final, Last Call, or Living as shown in the Ethereum GitHub repository. If the status of the EIP is changed to Withdrawn at any point prior to the resolution date, the market will resolve to “No” at that time. In any other case, the market will resolve “No.” Any further changes to the status will not be considered.
If the resolution source is removed or unavailable, the most recent version of the document shown in the GitHub commit history will be used. If both the resolution source and the commit history are unavailable, they will be re-checked the next day at 12:00 PM ET, after which if they are still unavailable, the market will resolve “No.”

question: Will the Colts beat the Lions by more than 2 points in their NFL Preseason matchup?
description: This is a market on whether the Indianapolis Colts will beat the Detroit Lions by over 2 points in their NFL preseason matchup scheduled to take place on August 27, 2021. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Indianapolis Colts win by over 2 points, and “No” otherwise. If the match is postponed to a date on or before September 27, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after September 27, 2021, or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will President Biden say “Trump” during his August 26 speech + Q&A?
description: This is a market on whether President Biden will say “Trump” during his August 26 speech, scheduled to take place at 5:00 PM ET. This market concerns the speech and any following Q&A, not later speeches in the day. The market will resolve to “Yes” if Biden says “Trump” during the speech and any following Q&A, as verified by live video and other credible sources. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” References to Trump will not count - only the word “Trump” will be considered. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will a major hurricane make landfall in the lower 48 states before September 15?
description: This is a market on whether a major hurricane will make landfall in the lower 48 states of the U.S. between the launch date of this market, August 26, 2021 at 5:45 PM ET, and the expiration date of this market, September 14, 2021, at 11:59:59 PM ET. For the purposes of this market, a major hurricane is a hurricane designated as Category 3 or higher, as described at https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/aboutsshws.php, and a major hurricane landfall is said to occur when a major hurricane's surface center intersects with the coastline, as described at https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/aboutgloss.shtml#LANDFALL. This market will resolve according to official advisories reported by the National Hurricane Center. This market will resolve to "Yes” if a major hurricane makes landfall in the conterminous United States during the market time-frame, and “No” otherwise. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
